headline: Why Brown & Brown (BRO) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of insurance brokerage firm Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) fell 7.3% in the afternoon session after the company reported mixed fourth-quarter 2025 results, with an earnings beat failing to offset a shortfall in revenue.

headline: Why Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of insurance brokerage firm Arthur J. Gallagher (NYSE:AJG) fell 4.7% in the afternoon session after a U.S. government proposal for nearly flat Medicare payment rates in 2027 dragged down health insurer stocks.

headline: Is Brown & Brown (BRO) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Brown & Brown is priced fairly or if there is still value left in the stock, this breakdown is designed to give you a clear, numbers driven view. The share price last closed at US$79.62, with returns of 2.6% year to date, a 25.7% decline over the past year, and gains of 41.3% over 3 years and 91.7% over 5 years. Recent price performance has put Brown & Brown back on many investors' watchlists, as the longer term returns contrast with the 1.4% decline over...

headline: Brown & Brown Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) executives highlighted strong full-year growth, solid margin performance, and continued acquisition activity during the company’s fourth-quarter earnings call, while also addressing the loss of employees and clients to a startup competitor and providing early expectation

headline: 1 Growth Stock Set to Flourishand 2 That Underwhelm
